==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|戈|口|一|ls=ic}}, “territory”.

Borrowed for abstract meanings. The derivative {{och-l|國}} and {{och-l|域}} refer to the original word.

Note that {{zh-l|*咸}} is not derived from {{lang|zh|或}}, and that the characters {{lang|zh|口}} and {{lang|zh|一}} are stacked in the opposite order in these characters. Both are ultimately from {{zh-l|*戈|halberd, spear}}.
